ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] JM Capozi
ygData.msgSnippet: K, I ll look for ya on Saturday...we mostly hang out at pendragon, faire pair, or at the sea devil tavern.  Oh, and I can t really drool on the girls, unless I
ygData.messageBody:
K, I'll look for ya on Saturday...we mostly hang out at pendragon, faire
pair, or at the sea devil tavern. Oh, and I can't really drool on the
girls, unless I want bruises...my wife seems to have something against
me drooling on them...*shrug*

As for the horn, yeah, grab a horn from the shop (you can also get one
from Krak in south karana, using the faction song, if you don't wanna
run all the way back to town. You'll be dubious to him, so run up, play
your faction song w/ wind, and you can use him as a merchant, or, sneak
behind him, and he'll trade, as well. If you can, get one of the
shell's out of Siren's Grotto...you seem to have some way of getting
high level stuff...

Lute of the Howler is a dream for me...I really don't think I'll ever
see one, much less own one...I'm still stuck w/ Mistmoore Drums, because
I can't seem to get a group together to go get dalnir/kaesora/ot coins
*shrug*

(I'd really like to get a Drums of the Beast, and see if the speed cap
is hit at 43...but...)

Mac

Donny Dane
ddane01@...
ddane@...
www.arrow-computing.com


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Talies the Wanderer [mailto:snicker@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, November 06, 2001 12:59 PM
> To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] JM Capozi
>
> At 12:40 PM 11/6/2001 -0600, you wrote:
> >Ok, so which shop?
> >I'm gonna be there this weekend for the afr (alt.fairs.renaissance)
> >invasion. I'll prolly be in the kilt, if you look at the pic's.
> >I'd like to actually meet a fellow bard :)
>
> I work for the Crowning Glory, next to the Battlemound. I'm the only
guy
> there. Try not to drool on the girls ;)
>
> >And Evulia,
> >No, I didn't win the contest...
> >E.J., the shaman got 1st place, and the Troll got 2nd. They get
custom
> >art of their characters done for winning.
>
> I saw that shaman all day, and kept thinking, "Damn, he looks
familiar" I
> didn't realize it was the costume, though *chuckles*
>
>
> >Talies, I was in EK as a bard at 16...if you go down by the shore,
past
> >the bridge from runnyeye, (around -1000 to -2000) you can pull single
> >gnolls and kite them up and down the shore...but if you get any adds,
> >head for the bridge and zone...
> >
> >At 18, I learned the 2 instrument/3 song twist here, fighting 2-4
gnolls
> >at a time. It's easy xp then...
>
> Hopefully easier with my beautiful Lute of the Howler... I guess I'll
> have
> to get a horn before I get that song, though, huh?
>
> Talies
>
>
